title: Trump hosts 'favorite president,' a self-described 'anarcho-capitalist'
shortDescription: Argentina's leader Javier Milei is a self-described radical libertarian and 'anarcho-capitalist' who claims to seek political advice from his dogs.

title: 'Batten down the hatches': White House warns more layoffs are coming
shortDescription: The White House said more mass layoffs of federal workers are coming, on top of the 4,000 fired last week, as the government shutdown continues.

title: Biden, Harris 'commend' Trump for securing Gaza ceasefire deal
shortDescription: Joe Biden and Kamala Harris said they "commend" President Trump for orchestrating a ceasefire and hostage deal in the war between Israel and Hamas.

title: Eric Trump’s book ‘Under Siege’ released today. What to know
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's son Eric Trump has released a new memoir, “Under Siege.” He talks about his family's political prospects with the Daily Mail.

title: Senate to vote as government shutdown reaches Day 14. Live updates
shortDescription: The Senate is set to return on Tuesday to vote for an eighth time on reopening the government. The plan is expected to fail again.

title: Gov. Gavin Newsom signs law banning Glock pistols in California
shortDescription: The law bans new sales of "semi-automatic handguns that can be easily converted to a fully automatic machine gun with the use of a simple 'switch.'"

title: Trump Cabinet members blame 'No Kings' protests for shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's treasury and transportation secretaries accused Democrats of extending the shutdown to satisfy "No Kings" protesters.

title: President Trump doubtful he'll go to heaven
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he may not make it to heaven despite brokering peace efforts in Gaza and aiming to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Former presidents mum as Trump-brokered ceasefire holds
shortDescription: The elder statesmen and stateswomen of the Democratic Party have mostly avoided joining the accolades for Trump amid Middle East ceasefire.

title: Trump vows to rebuild Gaza after ceasefire deal
shortDescription: President Trump held a summit with world leaders to discuss the next steps in rebuilding Gaza following the ceasefire deal.

title: Did Ivanka convert to Judaism? About President Trump’s Israel speech
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke at the Knesset on the Israel Hamas ceasefire deal. He mentioned Ivanka Trump's religion. Did she convert to Judaism?

title: Trump meets families of freed Israeli hostages
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met families of freed Israeli hostages and former hostages at the Knesset.

title: Trump signs Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed the Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal as hostages and prisoners were freed with aid flowing into Gaza.

title: Trump meeting with Xi back on as U.S. softens tone with China
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he expects Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping to still meet this month after Trump threatened to back out.

title: Trump says he won't get into heaven. What religion is he?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke to reporters on AF1 saying he won't get into heaven after the peace agreement between Israel and Hamas.
